channel.title: kaori on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in kaori on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Kaori lesson
item.description: 12:07 Saturday 18 July 2015 JST On Thursday, Kaori came to the lesson near Zavas in Kawasaki because no one else came. It seems she doesn’t like to come if anyone else attends. We talked about focused on a couple of grammar structures that were useful in the conversation, but I don’t remember what they were.
